title: Story Of A Needle
description: A story told, through the viewpoint of a sewing needle, about family life and siblings. The narration from the needle tells how he was made and witnesses the relationships within the family. The needle also makes friends with a thimble and some scissors. - Summary by Susan Russell

authors.name: Charlotte Maria Tucker (A. L. O. E.)
